item.title: Three Loops for Novice Programmers
item.description: Do you know how these three loops work? Take your time and think about the output of them. ^ ^

item.title: Swapping Numbers in Sorting Algorithms
item.description: In this post, I will demonstrate an interesting observation about swapping numbers in sorting algorithms.
